body:
```bash
# spack uninstall --force dyninst@master
==> The following packages will be uninstalled:

    -- linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64 / gcc@11.0.1 ------------------------
    f7ykkn2 dyninst@master

==> Do you want to proceed? [y/N] 
```
bad spack.
title: spack uninstall with --force should not ask me for confirmation
